name: Bricks In Block: Slide puzzle
description:
During the game you forget about time.

The point of this game is to remove all bricks without arrows from the board.

To do this, move the block on the playing field.
Bricks will move in the direction of the arrows. When three or more building bricks of the same color form a group, they will disappear and bring you points.
When you remove all the bricks without arrows, the level is complete.

Good luck:)
